thread.title: Kylie Jenner kisses Tyga on day out with King Cairo in LA
thread.title_full: Kylie Jenner kisses Tyga on day out with King Cairo in LA | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: Kylie Jenner kisses Tyga on day out with King Cairo in LA
text:
They were meant to be enjoying an arts and crafts class with four-year-old King Cairo during a family day out.
But Kylie Jenner couldn't help stealing a cheeky kiss from her beau Tyga , 27, in between the activities in Calabasas, California , on Monday.
The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star, 19, later played stepmom to her rapper boyfriend's son and held the little boy's hand as the trio left the restaurant and headed on to pottery painting.
Scroll down for video
Pucker up: Kylie Jenner couldn't help stealing a cheeky kiss from her beau Tyga, 27, in between the activities in Calabasas, California, on Monday
The trio looked like one happy family as they left the Kabuki restaurant in the San Fernando Valley.
Kylie was dressed in all black athletic apparel, including her new Yeezy Boost 350 V2s, gifted to her by Kanye West.
Tyga, also known as Michael Ray Nguyen-Stevenson, had on black sweat pants with black and white Vans on foot, and a green hooded sweatshirt featuring a tiger design with characters on the back.
Playing stepmom: The Keeping Up With the Kardashians star played stepmom to her rapper boyfriend's four-year-old child while grabbing dinner and doing arts and crafts in Calabasas
Perfect your downward dog in leggings by Alo Yoga £104.21 Alo Yoga high waist leggings
Get active now!
Buy now
Well we've made it to the middle of February and for that we're grateful.
But we have to say our fitness resolutions for 2017 haven't always been stuck to. When it's cold and miserable outside, it can be hard to motivate ourselves to get out on a run or down to the gym.
But we find buying a new outfit is always a great source of inspiration and if you buy new sports kit you're going to want to wear it right? So why not treat yourself to a new pair of leggings and get those work out goals back in sight.
Kylie Jenner may not be working up a sweat in these beauties by Alo Yoga but we do love their simplicity and flattering cut and fabric. If you do too then click (right) to snap up a pair now and style with a sports bra and tank.
Whether you're into yoga, spinning or boxing you can never have enough pairs of leggings so we've picked out some more all-black options below. From Adidas to Sweaty Betty we've got you covered.
* PRICES MAY NOT BE AS ADVERTISED ...NOW GET SOME LEGGINGS LIKE KYLIE'S FOR LESS £70 Sweaty Betty yoga leggings

Happy family: Kylie Jenner stepped out for a meal with Tyga and his son, King Cairo, in Los Angeles on Monday
Snuggled up: Kylie, 19, held the little boy's hand and he snuggled up to her side as the trio left the restaurant and headed on to pottery painting
Sushi date! The trio looked like one happy family as they entered the Kabuki restaurant in the San Fernando Valley
King Cairo was not to be left out of the impromptu fashion show, himself, wearing a black and white sweat suit by Moschino.
Cuddling up to his dad's girlfriend, the youngster seemed right at home with the two young lovers.
Kylie and Tyga were just as cozy, sharing a smooch as they ventured on to their second destination for the day of family fun.
Mini Kylie?: Kylie's worked on a female figure seated on a slab as she painted the hair a brown color, possibly recreating a version of herself at Color Me Mine
Checking it ou: Color Me Mine is an artistic spot for 'pottery painting for all ages and skill levels,' according to their website
Passionate projects: . The three of them worked intently on their individual projects until it was time to leave the studio
They made a stop at Color Me Mine, which is an artistic spot for 'pottery painting for all ages and skill levels,' according to their website .
The three of them worked intently on their individual projects.
Kylie's worked on a female figure seated on a slab as she painted the hair a brown color, possibly recreating a version of herself in the studio.
Yeezy style: Kylie was dressed in all black athletic apparel, including her new Yeezy Boost 350 V2s, gifted to her by Kanye West
Tiger for Tyga: The rapper had on black sweat pants with black and white Vans on foot, and a green hooded sweatshirt featuring a tiger design with characters on the back
Earlier, in a rare shy moment, the cosmetics mogul covered her face as she walked through the parking lot.
During that time Tyga literally embraced his fatherly duties, holding King Cairo in his arms as they made their way in for dinner.
The performer's son was content in his dad's grasp, with his little arms wrapped around Tyga's neck.
The couple concluded the night with a workout session that Kylie shared on Snapchat.
Fashionable child: King Cairo was not to be left out of the impromptu fashion show, himself, wearing a black and white sweat suit by Moschino
She's a natural: As King Cairo cuddled up to his dad's girlfriend, the youngster seemed right at home with the two young lovers
Doting daddy: Tyga literally embraced his fatherly duties, holding King Cairo in his arms as they made their way in for dinner, and later kissed his lady
Camera shy? Earlier, in a rare shy moment, the cosmetics mogul covered her face as she walked through the parking lot
King Cairo is Tyga's son with Blac Chyna, 28, who is currently engaged to Kylie's half-brother, Rob Kardashian, 29.
Chyna and Rob recently gave birth to their own baby girl, Dream Renee Kardashian, in November.
Tyga and Chyna were engaged in 2012 after their son was born, but broke things off in late 2014.
Blended family: King Cairo is Tyga's son with Blac Chyna, 28, who is currently engaged to Kylie's half-brother, Rob Kardashian, 29
Case of the ex: Chyna and Rob recently gave birth to their own baby girl, Dream Renee Kardashian, in November
Moving on: Tyga and Chyna were engaged in 2012 after their son was born, but broke things off in late 2014
Gym glamour: Kylie posed for a selfie while working out
Working up a sweat: Kylie and Tyga found a creative way to burn calories
Body goals: The Lip Kit queen admired her appearance in the mirror
Fit: Tyga showed off his impressive routine in the gym
Fitness first: The couple concluded the night with a workout session
